00:00:00:130000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:00:130000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:00:130000.Dialogue: Here we go. Pad thai, no peanuts.

00:00:02:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:02:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:02:150000.Dialogue: But does it have peanut oil?

00:00:04:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:04:050000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:04:050000.Dialogue: I'm not sure. Everyone keep an eye on Howard in case he starts to swell up.

00:00:09:130000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:09:130000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:09:130000.Dialogue: Since it's not bee season, you can have my epinephrine.

00:00:13:070000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:13:070000.Speaker: Raj

00:00:16:030000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:16:030000.Speaker: Leonard

00:00:17:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:17:120000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:17:120000.Dialogue: Thailand has had the fork since the latter half of the 19th Century. Interestingly they don't put the fork in their mouth-- they use it to put the food on a spoon which then goes into their mouth.

00:00:27:080000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:27:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:27:080000.Dialogue: Ask him for a napkin. I dare you.

00:00:31:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:31:040000.Speaker: Leonard

00:00:32:190000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:32:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:32:190000.Dialogue: Do I look puffy? I feel puffy.

00:00:36:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:36:090000.Speaker: Penny

00:00:37:230000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:37:230000.Speaker: Penny

00:00:40:230000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:40:230000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:40:230000.Dialogue: Look at my fingers. They're like Vienna sausages.

00:00:43:200000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:43:200000.Speaker: Penny

00:00:50:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:50:210000.Speaker: Penny
00:00:50:210000.Dialogue: You know, it's a Cheesecake Factory. People order cheesecake and I bring it to them.

00:00:54:230000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:00:54:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:54:230000.Dialogue: So you kind of act like a carbohydrate delivery system.

00:01:01:130000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:01:130000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:01:130000.Dialogue: Yeah. Call it whatever you want, I get minimum wage.

00:01:06:110000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:06:110000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:06:110000.Dialogue: I was wondering if you could help me out - with something.

00:01:08:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:08:090000.Speaker: Leonard

00:01:10:220000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:10:220000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:10:220000.Dialogue: Great. I'm having some furniture delivered tomorrow and I may not be here, so... Hello.

00:01:22:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:22:090000.Speaker: Penny

00:01:26:200000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:26:200000.Speaker: Penny

00:01:28:010000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:28:010000.Speaker: Howard

00:01:30:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:30:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:30:040000.Dialogue: Yeah. I probably won't. - Hey, Sheldon.

00:01:32:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:32:170000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:01:34:030000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:34:030000.Speaker: Penny

00:01:37:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:37:120000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:37:120000.Dialogue: Still not talking to me, huh?

00:01:39:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:39:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:01:39:050000.Dialogue: Don't take it personally, it's his pathology. He can't talk to women.

00:01:42:160000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:42:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:01:42:160000.Dialogue: It can't talk to atractive woman, or in your case, a cheesecake- scented goddess.

00:01:47:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:47:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:47:120000.Dialogue: So there's gonna be some furniture delivered?

00:01:49:230000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:49:230000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:49:230000.Dialogue: If it gets here and I'm not here, could you sign and have them put it in my apartment?

00:01:54:010000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:54:010000.Speaker: Leonard

00:01:55:060000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:55:060000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:55:060000.Dialogue: Great. Here's my spare key. Thank you.

00:01:59:130000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:01:59:130000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:59:130000.Dialogue: Penny, wait. If you don't have any other plans, do you want to join us for Thai food and a Superman movie marathon?

00:02:09:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:09:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:02:09:040000.Dialogue: A marathon? How many Superman movies are there?

00:02:12:100000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:12:100000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:02:15:070000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:15:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:02:15:070000.Dialogue: I do like the one where Lois Lane falls from the helicopter and Superman swooshes down and catches her. Which one was that?

00:02:20:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:20:150000.Speaker: Leonard, Sheldon, and Howard together

00:02:22:180000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:22:180000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:22:180000.Dialogue: You realize that scene was rife with scientific inaccuracy.

00:02:26:100000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:26:100000.Speaker: Penny
00:02:26:100000.Dialogue: Yes, I know, men can't fly.

00:02:28:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:28:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:28:050000.Dialogue: No. Let's assume that they can.

00:02:31:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:31:120000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:31:120000.Dialogue: Lois Lane is falling, accelerating at an initial rate of 32 feet per second per second. Superman swoops down to save her by reaching out two arms of steel. Miss Lane, who is now traveling at approximately 120 miles an hour, hits them and is immediately sliced into three equal pieces.

00:02:47:180000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:47:180000.Speaker: Leonard
00:02:47:180000.Dialogue: Unless Superman matches her speed and decelerates.

00:02:51:060000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:02:51:060000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:51:060000.Dialogue: In what space, sir? She's two feet above the ground. Frankly, if he really loved her, he'd let her hit the pavement. It'd be a more merciful death.

00:03:00:030000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:00:030000.Speaker: Leonard
00:03:00:030000.Dialogue: Excuse me, your entire argument is predicated on the assumption that Superman's flight is a feat of strength.

00:03:06:140000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:06:140000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:03:06:140000.Dialogue: Are you listening to yourself? It is well established that his flight is a feat of strength. It is an extension of his ability to leap tall buildings, an ability he derives from exposure to Earth's yellow sun.

00:03:15:140000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:15:140000.Speaker: Howard
00:03:15:140000.Dialogue: And how does he fly at night?

00:03:17:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:17:150000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:03:17:150000.Dialogue: A combination of the moon's solar reflection and the energy-storage capacity of Kryptonian skin cells.

00:03:24:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:24:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:03:24:050000.Dialogue: I'm just gonna go wash up.

00:03:26:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:26:040000.Speaker: Leonard
00:03:26:040000.Dialogue: I have 2,600 comic books in there. I challenge you to find a single reference to Kryptonian skin cells.

00:03:31:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:31:170000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:03:38:180000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s apartment. Sheldon, Leonard, Howard and Raj are present.
00:03:38:180000.Speaker: Raj

00:04:06:020000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:06:020000.Speaker: Leonard
00:04:06:020000.Dialogue: Her apartment's on the fourth floor but the elevator's broken, so... You're just gonna be done? Okay. Cool. Thanks

00:04:12:230000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:12:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:04:12:230000.Dialogue: We'll just bring it up ourselves.

00:04:14:170000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:14:170000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:04:17:100000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:17:100000.Speaker: Leonard

00:04:18:220000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:18:220000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:04:18:220000.Dialogue: Well, we don't have a dolly, or lifting belts or any measurable upper-body strength.

00:04:25:080000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:25:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:04:25:080000.Dialogue: We don't need strength-- we're physicists. We are the intellectual descendants of Archimedes. Give me a fulcrum and a lever and I can move the Earth. It's just a matter of... I don't have this.

00:04:36:140000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:36:140000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:04:45:030000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:45:030000.Speaker: Leonard

00:04:47:020000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:47:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:04:47:020000.Dialogue: Yes, but they all involve a green lantern and a power ring.

00:04:51:200000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:51:200000.Speaker: Leonard

00:04:59:150000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:04:59:150000.Speaker: Leonard
00:04:59:150000.Dialogue: Now we've got an inclined plane. The force required to lift is reduced by the sine of the angle of the stairs, call it 30 degrees, so, about half.

00:05:06:180000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:06:180000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:05:10:030000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:10:030000.Speaker: Leonard

00:05:12:190000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:12:190000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:12:190000.Dialogue: Let's push. See, it's moving, this is easy.

00:05:20:100000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:20:100000.Speaker: Leonard

00:05:22:180000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:22:180000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:05:22:180000.Dialogue: - What's your formula for the corner?

00:05:31:140000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:31:140000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:31:140000.Dialogue: Okay, no problem. Just come up here, help me pull and turn.

00:05:39:160000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:39:160000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:05:39:160000.Dialogue: Ah, gravity, thou art a heartless bitch.

00:05:44:120000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:44:120000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:05:44:120000.Dialogue: You do understand that our efforts here will in no way increase the odds of you having sexual congress with this woman.

00:05:51:120000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:51:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:51:120000.Dialogue: Men do things for women without expecting sex.

00:05:54:070000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:54:070000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:05:54:070000.Dialogue: Those would be men who just had sex.

00:05:57:210000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:05:57:210000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:57:210000.Dialogue: I'm doing this to be a good neighbor. In any case, there's no way it could lower the odds.

00:06:06:050000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:06:06:050000.Speaker: Leonard
00:06:06:050000.Dialogue: Almost there. Almost there. - Almost there.

00:06:10:070000.Scene: Ground floor hallway of the apartment building. Leonard is signing for the delivery.
00:06:10:070000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:10:070000.Dialogue: - No, we're not. - I'm sorry. - No, we're not!

00:06:15:110000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:15:110000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:15:110000.Dialogue: Watch your fingers. Oh, God, my fingers!

00:06:21:020000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:21:020000.Speaker: Leonard

00:06:28:050000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:28:050000.Speaker: Leonard

00:06:29:200000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:29:200000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:29:200000.Dialogue: A little messy? The Mandelbrot set of complex numbers is a little messy. This is chaos. Excuse me. Explain to me an organizational system where a tray of flatware on a couch is valid.

00:06:43:010000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:43:010000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:43:010000.Dialogue: I'm just inferring this is a couch because the evidence suggests the coffee table is having a tiny garage sale.

00:06:49:210000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:49:210000.Speaker: Leonard
00:06:49:210000.Dialogue: Did it ever occur to you that not everyone has the compulsive need to sort, organize and label the entire world around them?

00:06:56:180000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:56:180000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:06:59:070000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:06:59:070000.Speaker: Leonard
00:06:59:070000.Dialogue: Well, they don't. Hard as it may be for you to believe, most people don't sort their breakfast cereal numerically by fiber content.

00:07:07:090000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:07:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:07:07:090000.Dialogue: Excuse me, but I think we've both found that helpful at times.

00:07:13:110000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:13:110000.Speaker: Leonard

00:07:17:070000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:17:070000.Speaker: Leonard

00:07:20:050000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:20:050000.Speaker: Leonard

00:07:21:220000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:21:220000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:07:21:220000.Dialogue: This is not anyone's home. This is a swirling vortex of entropy.

00:07:27:120000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:27:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:07:27:120000.Dialogue: When the transvestite lived here, you didn't care how he kept the place.

00:07:30:230000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:30:230000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:07:30:230000.Dialogue: Because it was immaculate. I mean, you opened that man's closet, it was left to right evening gowns, cocktail dresses, then his police uniforms.

00:07:40:100000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:40:100000.Speaker: Leonard
00:07:40:100000.Dialogue: What were you doing in his closet?

00:07:42:020000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:42:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:07:42:020000.Dialogue: I helped him run some cable for a web cam.

00:07:46:050000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:46:050000.Speaker: Leonard
00:07:46:050000.Dialogue: This just arrived, we just brought this up... just now.

00:07:48:200000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:48:200000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:48:200000.Dialogue: Great. Was it hard getting it up the stairs?

00:07:51:020000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:51:020000.Speaker: Leonard

00:07:52:120000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:52:120000.Speaker: Leonard

00:07:54:010000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:54:010000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:07:56:040000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:56:040000.Speaker: Leonard
00:07:56:040000.Dialogue: Well, we'll get out of your hair.

00:07:57:210000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:07:57:210000.Speaker: Penny

00:08:04:090000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:08:04:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:08:04:090000.Dialogue: I just want you to know that you don't have to live like this. I'm here for you.

00:08:11:170000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:08:11:170000.Speaker: Penny

00:08:14:150000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:08:14:150000.Speaker: Leonard

00:08:16:080000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:08:16:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:08:16:080000.Dialogue: Yeah, he didn't tell it right.

00:08:17:000000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.

00:09:14:070000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:14:070000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:09:18:020000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:18:020000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:18:020000.Dialogue: Are you insane? You can't just break into a woman's apartment in the middle of the night and clean.

00:09:23:030000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:23:030000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:09:23:030000.Dialogue: I had no choice. I couldn't sleep knowing that just outside my bedroom was our living room, and just outside our living room was that hallway, and immediately adjacent to the hallway was... this.

00:09:35:060000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:35:060000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:35:060000.Dialogue: Do you realize that if Penny wakes up, there is no reasonable explanation as to why we're here.

00:09:40:140000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:40:140000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:09:40:140000.Dialogue: I just gave you a reasonable explanation.

00:09:43:170000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:43:170000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:43:170000.Dialogue: No, no, you gave me an explanation. Its reasonableness will be determined by a jury of your peers.

00:09:50:050000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:50:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:09:50:050000.Dialogue: Don't be ridiculous. I have no peers.

00:09:53:090000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:53:090000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:53:090000.Dialogue: We have to get out of here.

00:09:58:070000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:09:58:070000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:09:58:070000.Dialogue: You might want to speak in a lower register.

00:10:01:080000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:01:080000.Speaker: Leonard

00:10:03:020000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:03:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:03:020000.Dialogue: Evolution has made women sensitive to high-pitched noises while they sleep so that they'll be roused by a crying baby. If you want to avoid waking her, speak in a lower register.

00:10:14:060000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:14:060000.Speaker: Leonard

00:10:18:200000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:18:200000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:10:25:170000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:25:170000.Speaker: Leonard

00:10:28:180000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:28:180000.Speaker: Leonard
00:10:28:180000.Dialogue: I accept your premise. Now, please, let's go.

00:10:31:190000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:31:190000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:31:190000.Dialogue: I'm not leaving until I'm done.

00:10:38:080000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:38:080000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:38:080000.Dialogue: If you have time to lean, you have time to clean.

00:10:45:090000.Scene: Inside Penny’s apartment. They are laying the package down on the floor.
00:10:45:090000.Speaker: Leonard

00:10:52:190000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:10:52:190000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:10:54:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:10:54:120000.Speaker: Leonard

00:10:56:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:10:56:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:56:050000.Dialogue: I have to say I slept splendidly. Granted, not long, but just deeply and well.

00:11:02:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:02:210000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:02:210000.Dialogue: I'm not surprised. A well-known folk cure for insomnia is to break in your neighbor's apartment and clean.

00:11:09:220000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:09:220000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:11:11:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:11:170000.Speaker: Leonard

00:11:13:160000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:13:160000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:13:160000.Dialogue: Granted, my methods may have been somewhat unorthodox, but I think the end result will be a measurable enhancement - to Penny's quality of life

00:11:19:030000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:19:030000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:19:030000.Dialogue: - You've convinced me. Maybe tonight we should sneak in and shampoo her carpet.

00:11:25:020000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:25:020000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:25:020000.Dialogue: - Yes. For God's sake, do I have to hold up a sarcasm sign every time I open my mouth?

00:11:33:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:33:150000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:11:38:060000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:38:060000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:38:060000.Dialogue: No, I do not have a sarcasm sign.

00:11:41:070000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:41:070000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:41:070000.Dialogue: Do you want some cereal? I feel so good today, I'm gonna choose from the low-fiber end of the shelf. Hello, Honey Puffs.

00:11:48:100000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:48:100000.Speaker: Penny

00:11:51:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:51:170000.Speaker: Leonard

00:11:53:180000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:53:180000.Speaker: Penny

00:11:57:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:11:57:150000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:57:150000.Dialogue: How did she know it was us?

00:12:00:160000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:00:160000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:00:160000.Dialogue: I may have left a suggested organizational schematic for her bedroom closet.

00:12:06:020000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:06:020000.Speaker: Leonard
00:12:06:020000.Dialogue: God, this is gonna be bad.

00:12:07:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:07:150000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:07:150000.Dialogue: Good-bye, Honey Puffs. Hello, Big Bran.

00:12:11:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:11:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:11:050000.Dialogue: You came into my apartment last night while I was sleeping?!

00:12:13:190000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:13:190000.Speaker: Leonard

00:12:15:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:15:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:15:050000.Dialogue: Really more to organize. You're not actually dirty, per se.

00:12:18:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:18:210000.Speaker: Penny

00:12:21:220000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:21:220000.Speaker: Leonard

00:12:23:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:23:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:23:050000.Dialogue: Do you understand how creepy this is?

00:12:25:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:25:090000.Speaker: Leonard
00:12:25:090000.Dialogue: Oh, yes, we discussed it at length last night.

00:12:27:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:27:210000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:27:210000.Dialogue: In my apartment, while I was sleeping?!

00:12:30:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:30:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:30:090000.Dialogue: And snoring. And that's probably just a sinus infection. But it could be sleep apnea. You might want to see an otolaryngologist.

00:12:39:200000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:39:200000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:12:42:200000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:42:200000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:42:200000.Dialogue: And what kind of doctor removes shoes from asses?

00:12:46:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:12:46:210000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:46:210000.Dialogue: Depending on the depth, that's either a... proctologist or a general surgeon.

00:13:03:230000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:03:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:13:03:230000.Dialogue: I think what you're feeling is perfectly valid and maybe a little bit later when you're feeling a little less... for lack of a better word-- violated, maybe we can talk about this some more.

00:13:12:160000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:12:160000.Speaker: Leonard
00:13:12:160000.Dialogue: - Sure, that's another way to go.

00:13:16:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:16:040000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:16:040000.Dialogue: Penny, Penny! Just to clarify, because there will be a discussion when you leave,

00:13:23:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:23:040000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:23:040000.Dialogue: is your objection solely to our presence in the apartment while you were sleeping, or do you also object to the imposition of a new organizational paradigm.

00:13:37:210000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:37:210000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:37:210000.Dialogue: Well, that was a little non-responsive.

00:13:40:190000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:40:190000.Speaker: Leonard
00:13:40:190000.Dialogue: You are going to march yourself over there right now and apologize.

00:13:48:180000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:48:180000.Speaker: Leonard

00:13:50:040000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:50:040000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:13:54:140000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:13:54:140000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:54:140000.Dialogue: Boy, you are all over the place this morning.

00:14:01:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:01:050000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:14:01:050000.Dialogue: I have a master's and two Ph.D.s, I should not have to do this.

00:14:05:050000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:05:050000.Speaker: Penny

00:14:06:220000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:06:220000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:14:06:220000.Dialogue: I am truly sorry for what happened last night. I take full responsibility.

00:14:11:110000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:11:110000.Speaker: Sheldonn
00:14:11:110000.Dialogue: And I hope that it won't color your opinion of Leonard,

00:14:14:020000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:14:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:14:14:020000.Dialogue: who is not only a wonderful guy, but also, I hear, a gentle and thorough lover.

00:14:32:030000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room, morning. Sheldon enters, singing to himself.
00:14:32:030000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:14:38:090000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:14:38:090000.Speaker: Penny

00:14:44:210000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:14:44:210000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:44:210000.Dialogue: Hey, listen. I don't know if you heard about what happened last night. but I'm really upset about it. I mean, they just... they let themselves into my place and then they cleaned it. Can you even believe that? How weird is that?

00:14:56:220000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:14:56:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:14:56:220000.Dialogue: She's standing very close to me.

00:14:59:200000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:14:59:200000.Speaker: Raj
00:14:59:200000.Dialogue: Oh, my, she does smell good. What is that, vanilla?

00:15:04:100000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:04:100000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:04:100000.Dialogue: You know, where I come from, if someone comes into your house at night, you shoot. Okay? And you don't shoot to wound. I mean, all right, my sister shot her husband, but it was an accident, they were drunk.

00:15:15:180000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:15:180000.Speaker: Penny

00:15:17:180000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:17:180000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:17:180000.Dialogue: She's so chatty. Maybe my parents are right.| Maybe I'd be better off with an Indian girl. We'd have the same cultural background and my wife could sing to my children the same lullabies my mother sang to me.

00:15:30:020000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:30:020000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:30:020000.Dialogue: It's obvious that they meant well, but... I'm having a really rough time. I broke up with my boyfriend and... Just because most of the men I've known in my life happen to be jerks, doesn't mean I should just assume Leonard and Sheldon are. Right?

00:15:49:020000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:49:020000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:49:020000.Dialogue: She asked me a question. I should probably nod.

00:15:54:080000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:15:54:080000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:54:080000.Dialogue: That's exactly what I thought. Thank you for listening. You're a doll.

00:16:00:170000.Scene: The stairwell. Raj is coming up the stairs, he meets Penny who is going down.
00:16:00:170000.Speaker: Raj

00:16:16:000000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:16:000000.Speaker: Howard
00:16:16:000000.Dialogue: Grab a napkin, homie. You just got served.

00:16:21:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:21:120000.Speaker: Leonard

00:16:24:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:24:170000.Speaker: Howard

00:16:26:090000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:26:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:16:26:090000.Dialogue: His imaginary girlfriend broke up with him.

00:16:30:140000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:30:140000.Speaker: Howard

00:16:35:100000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:35:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:35:100000.Dialogue: Sorry I'm late, but I was in the hallway, chatting up Penny.

00:16:39:150000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:39:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:16:39:150000.Dialogue: Really? You, Rajesh Koothrappali, spoke to Penny?

00:16:43:080000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:43:080000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:43:080000.Dialogue: Actually, I was less the chatter than the chat-ee.

00:16:46:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:46:170000.Speaker: Leonard
00:16:46:170000.Dialogue: What did she say? Is she still mad at me?

00:16:48:220000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:48:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:48:220000.Dialogue: Well, she was upset at first, but probably because her sister shot somebody.

00:16:55:110000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:55:110000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:55:110000.Dialogue: But then there was something about you, and then she hugged me.

00:16:59:120000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:16:59:120000.Speaker: Howard
00:16:59:120000.Dialogue: She hugged you? How'd she hug you?

00:17:10:170000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:17:10:170000.Speaker: Howard
00:17:10:170000.Dialogue: Is that her perfume I smell?

00:17:14:100000.Scene: Sheldon and Leonard’s living room. Howard is there, playing on a dance video game.
00:17:14:100000.Speaker: Raj

00:17:32:210000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:17:32:210000.Speaker: Penny

00:17:39:170000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:17:39:170000.Speaker: Leonard

00:17:47:140000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:17:47:140000.Speaker: Leonard
00:17:47:140000.Dialogue: Just as Oppenheimer came to regret his contributions to the first atomic bomb, so too I regret my participation in what was, at the very least, an error in judgment.

00:17:58:010000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:17:58:010000.Speaker: Leonard
00:17:58:010000.Dialogue: The hallmark of the great human experiment is the willingness to recognize one's mistakes. Some mistakes, such as Madam Curie's discovery of radium, turned out to have great scientific potential, even though she would later die a slow, painful death from radiation poisoning.

00:18:12:220000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:18:12:220000.Speaker: Leonard
00:18:12:220000.Dialogue: Another example, from the field of Ebola research...

00:18:21:050000.Scene: The hallway, Leonard puts a note under Penny’s door. It opens.
00:18:21:050000.Speaker: Penny

00:18:41:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:18:41:020000.Speaker: Leonard

00:18:43:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:18:43:040000.Speaker: Leonard

00:18:45:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:18:45:150000.Speaker: Penny
00:18:45:150000.Dialogue: You guys, seriously, I grew up on a farm, okay? I rebuilt a tractor engine when I was, like, 12. I think I can put together a cheap, Swedish media center.

00:18:52:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:18:52:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:18:52:120000.Dialogue: No, please. We insist. It's the least we can do, considering.

00:18:55:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:18:55:150000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:18:55:150000.Dialogue: Considering what? How great this place looks?

00:19:00:090000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:00:090000.Speaker: Leonard

00:19:02:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:02:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:02:180000.Dialogue: These instructions are a pictographic representation of the least imaginative way to assemble these components. This, right here is why Sweden has no space program.

00:19:12:130000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:12:130000.Speaker: Penny
00:19:12:130000.Dialogue: Well, it looked pretty good in the store.

00:19:14:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:14:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:19:14:120000.Dialogue: It is an inefficient design. For example, she has a flat screen TV, which means all the space behind it is wasted.

00:19:19:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:19:180000.Speaker: Leonard

00:19:22:110000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:22:110000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:19:22:110000.Dialogue: Run an infrared repeater. Photo cell here, emitter here, easy-peasy.

00:19:27:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:27:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:27:150000.Dialogue: How are you gonna cool it?

00:19:29:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:29:020000.Speaker: Penny

00:19:34:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:34:020000.Speaker: Leonard
00:19:34:020000.Dialogue: Also inefficient, and might be loud.

00:19:36:000000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:36:000000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:36:000000.Dialogue: How about liquid coolant? Maybe a little aquarium pump here, run some quarter-inch PVC...

00:19:40:090000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:40:090000.Speaker: Penny
00:19:40:090000.Dialogue: Guys, this is actually really simple.

00:19:43:030000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:43:030000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:43:030000.Dialogue: Hold on, honey. Men at work.

00:19:47:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:47:040000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:47:040000.Dialogue: The PVC comes down here. Maybe a little corrugated sheet metal as a radiator here.

00:19:50:220000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:50:220000.Speaker: Leonard
00:19:50:220000.Dialogue: Yeah? Show me where we put a drip tray, a sluice, and an overflow reservoir.

00:19:54:070000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:54:070000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:19:54:070000.Dialogue: If water's involved, we're gonna have to ground the crap out of the thing.

00:19:57:160000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:19:57:160000.Speaker: Penny
00:19:57:160000.Dialogue: It's hot in here. I think I'll just take off all my clothes.

00:20:05:210000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:05:210000.Speaker: Leonard

00:20:08:130000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:08:130000.Speaker: Leonard
00:20:08:130000.Dialogue: What about if we replace panels A, B and F and crossbar H with aircraft-grade aluminum?

00:20:13:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:13:180000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:20:13:180000.Dialogue: Right. Then the entire thing is one heat sink.

00:20:15:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:15:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:20:15:190000.Dialogue: You and Sheldon go to the junkyard and pick up 6 square meters of scrap aluminum? Raj and I will get the oxyacetylene torch.

00:20:21:070000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:21:070000.Speaker: Leonard
00:20:21:070000.Dialogue: - Meet back here in an hour?

00:20:27:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Sheldon and Leonard are trying to construct furniture.
00:20:27:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:20:27:040000.Dialogue: Okay, this place does look pretty good.
